= Permissions RESTful API = #top
''No description.'' [[BR]]

== Grant Role Permissions ==
''Grant permissions for a resource to a role'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': POST [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /permissions/role/grant/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': READ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 400 Bad Request if the required parameters are not present [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': true [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''parameters''': 
 * '''rolename''' ''(required)'' <str> ''name of role to grant permissions to''
 * '''resource''' ''(required)'' <str> ''uri path of resource to grant permissions on''
 * '''operations''' ''(required)'' <list of strings> ''valid operations are: CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, EXECUTE''
[[BR]]

== Show Permissions ==
''Show the permissions for a given resource'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': POST [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /permissions/show/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': super user only [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 400 Bad Request if the required parameters are not present [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': permissions for given resource [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''example''': 
{{{
#!js
{"id": "78daa991-ec1f-4908-9b59-5c1010bde7a6",
 "resource": "/",
 "users": {"admin": ["CREATE", "READ", "UPDATE", "DELETE", "EXECUTE"]}
}
}}}
[[BR]]
'''parameters''': 
 * '''resource''' ''(required)'' <str> ''resource path''
[[BR]]
